mapper.sql: factionId, factionName, factionImg, classifyCode, tag, minGrade, intro, auto, inviteLink, createTime, updateTime, userId, state, announcement, peopleLimit, factionGrade
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM bb_question_faction WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT factionId, factionName, factionImg, classifyCode, tag, minGrade, intro, auto, inviteLink, createTime, updateTime, userId, state, announcement, peopleLimit, factionGrade FROM bb_question_faction WHERE 1=1
AND factionId in(SELECT factionId FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_faction_member where userId = #{userId})

SELECT factionId, factionName, factionImg, classifyCode, tag, minGrade, intro, auto, inviteLink, createTime, updateTime, userId, state, announcement, peopleLimit, factionGrade, (SELECT count(memberId) from bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) peopleNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question where userId =#{userId} and factionId = f.factionId) questionNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId = '' and userId =#{userId} and factionId = f.factionId) answerNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId != '' and userId =#{userId} and factionId = f.factionId) discussNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId = '' and isAccept = '1' and userId =#{userId} and factionId = f.factionId) adoptNum FROM bb_question_faction f WHERE 1=1
AND factionId in(SELECT factionId FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_faction_member where userId = #{userId})

SELECT factionId, factionName, factionImg, classifyCode, tag, minGrade, intro, auto, inviteLink, createTime, updateTime, userId, state, announcement, peopleLimit, factionGrade,
(SELECT count(memberId) from bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) peopleNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId = '' and DATE_FORMAT( createTime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) and userId in(SELECT userId FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) and factionId = f.factionId) answerNumM,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId != '' and DATE_FORMAT( createTime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) and userId in(SELECT userId FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) and factionId = f.factionId) discussNumM,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId = '' and DATE_FORMAT( createTime, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) and isAccept = '1' and userId in(SELECT userId FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) and factionId = f.factionId) adoptNumM,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId = '' and DATE_FORMAT( createTime, '%Y' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y' ) and userId in(SELECT userId FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) and factionId = f.factionId) answerNumY,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId != '' and DATE_FORMAT( createTime, '%Y' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y' ) and userId in(SELECT userId FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) and factionId = f.factionId) discussNumY,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId = '' and DATE_FORMAT( createTime, '%Y' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y' ) and isAccept = '1' and userId in(SELECT userId FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) and factionId = f.factionId) adoptNumY,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId = '' and userId in(SELECT userId FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) and factionId = f.factionId) answerNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId != '' and userId in(SELECT userId FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) and factionId = f.factionId) discussNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId = '' and isAccept = '1' and userId in(SELECT userId FROM abc12366_bangbang.bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) and factionId = f.factionId) adoptNum

SELECT a.id, a.parentId, a.questionId,q.title, a.userId, a.answerUserId,a.ip, a.answer, a.status, a.createTime, a.lastUpdate, a.isAccept FROM bb_question_answer a left join bb_question q on a.questionId = q.id WHERE a.userId in(SELECT userId FROM bb_question_faction_member where factionId = #{factionId}) order by a.createTime desc

SELECT factionId, factionName, factionImg, classifyCode, tag, minGrade, intro, auto, inviteLink, createTime, updateTime, userId, state, announcement, peopleLimit, factionGrade,
(SELECT u.nickname FROM bb_question_faction_member m left join bb_user u on m.userId = u.id where factionId = f.factionId and duty = 1) nickname,
(SELECT u.nickname FROM bb_question_faction_member m left join bb_user u on m.userId = u.id where factionId = f.factionId and duty = 2) nickname2,
(SELECT count(memberId) from bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) peopleNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question where factionId = f.factionId) questionNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId = '' and factionId = f.factionId) answerNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId != '' and factionId = f.factionId) discussNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId = '' and isAccept = '1' and factionId = f.factionId) adoptNum FROM bb_question_faction f WHERE 1=1 order by 2*answerNum+discussNum+7*adoptNum desc

SELECT factionId, factionName, factionImg, classifyCode, tag, minGrade, intro, auto, inviteLink, createTime, updateTime, userId, state, announcement, peopleLimit, factionGrade,
(SELECT u.nickname FROM bb_question_faction_member m left join bb_user u on m.userId = u.id where factionId = f.factionId and duty = 1) nickname,
(SELECT u.nickname FROM bb_question_faction_member m left join bb_user u on m.userId = u.id where factionId = f.factionId and duty = 2) nickname2,
(SELECT count(memberId) from bb_question_faction_member where factionId = f.factionId) peopleNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question where factionId = f.factionId) questionNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId = '' and factionId = f.factionId) answerNum,
(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId != '' and factionId = f.factionId) discussNum,

select count(*) from (SELECT id,(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId != '' and parentId = a.id) plcnt, (SELECT count(likeId) FROM bb_question_like where id = a.id) likecnt FROM bb_question_answer a WHERE parentId = '' AND DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') AND factionId = #{factionId} ) b where b.plcnt >2 and b.likecnt >6
